channel.title: Posts on Alex Zhang

item.title: Cape Town, Bru
item.description: Time has flown by since I’ve gotten here!

item.title: Rome Wasn't Built in a Day
A post without an Image
item.description: Far far away, behind the word mountains, far from the countries Vokalia and Consonantia, there live the blind texts. A small river named Duden flows by their place and supplies it with the necessary regelialia. It is a paradisematic country, in which roasted parts of sentences fly into your mouth.

item.title: This is a Standard Post
item.description: This is what an ordinary post looks like, and you’re reading a custom excerpt right now. Have fun looking around the theme, and don’t forget to check it out on your phone!

item.title: Building a Blog via Blogdown and Hugo
item.description: Intro This is a beginner’s tutorial to building a website through the R Package ‘Blogdown’ and Hugo. Install RStudio (https://www.rstudio.com/products/rstudio/) and R (https://www.r-project.org/) to get started. Create an EMPTY directory (make sure it is empty besides the .Rproj file). Run the following commands in the console. Sometimes Blogdown will give you weird errors if you run this code in a newly created R script file, so avoid making any new files until the commands below are executed.

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.
